A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Thank you to everyone on Rotten Tomatoes for confirming I didn't lose my mind at the theater last night. I got home and was so upset. Was I the only one?  Critics gave this a 94% so I MUST have missed something\, right?  I have never had a more disappointing movie going experience in my life. Luke - wasted.  Mary Poppins Leia - joke.  Snoke?  Apparently a side character who really DOESN'T matter (making TFA a completely different movie)?   Shirtless Kylo?  What?!?!  Sitting in space\, not being able to attack the Republic for 90 minutes...waiting for them to run out of fuel?  Luke milked a creature and drank it?!?! I get it - call back to the blue/green milk from ANH but what the actual $%^&?!?!?  I thought FOR SURE Luke was going to be the heavy/bad guy at the end. Or MAYBE there would be an epic lightsaber duel.  No payoff.  And now Han Solo's death seems more pointless.  I really do feel bad to Rian right now - I have no doubt he tried delivering something great - he simply missed BIGTIME.  Thank you again RT.
